idea-plugin.name: Single Hotswap
idea-plugin.description:
With this plugin you can hotswap way faster than usual by hotswapping only the file opened in the editor. The builtin feature of Intellij "Compile and Reload" always reloads every single file that is referenced by the target class.
This plugin will provide a blue hammer next to the green "Build Project" hammer.
